official-title.#text:
To deny visas and entry to the United States to officials and employees of the Government of the
			 Russian Federation due to the Russian military intervention in Ukraine,
			 and for other purposes.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text:

			 Russian Federation due to the Russian military intervention into Ukraine

shall deny admission into the United States to, all officials and

text.#text: Except as necessary to meet United States obligations under the Agreement between the
the military intervention into Ukraine by the Russian Federation has ceased; and

the Russian Federation respects the sovereignty, independence, and territorial integrity of Ukraine
